title: Personal Website
description: I made this website to better showcase my experiences, projects, and most importantly, my personality. I find infinite passion and joy in the things I do, and want to convey that to you as best I can. I hope you enjoy this showcase of my skills and passions.

title: Prototype 3D Action Game
description: This is a untitled 3d game thing

title: Automatic Product Image Uploader
description: Utilized Shopify's GraphQL Admin API and Python to simplify the product image upload process and reduced human labor and mistakes by 10 times.

title: Automatic Updating Power Bi Sales Dashboard
description: Used Power BI and Shopify's GraphQL API to query and display all sales data.

title: Wealthsimple Case Competition
description: Achieved within the top 5% of participants. My team and I created a customer base expansion strategy according to Wealthsimple's objectives and specifications using real world research.

title: EVIS, Elegant Visual Impairment Solution
description: A prototype augmented reality headset for the visually impaired. Combining my skills in programming, animation, and 3D modelling, I worked with 2 friends to create a virtual reality headset designed for the visually impaired to be able to zoom in onto reality. We presented this project to mock investors.

title: Android 2D Physics Engine
description: I developed an app that had a simple 2D physics engine using Java and Android Studio. The demo I created had a character on the screen move with constant acceleration, friction, and a particle system.
